channel.title: Megan Ansdell on Astro Data Group
channel.description: Recent content in Megan Ansdell on Astro Data Group

item.title: STELLA - Detecting TESS Flares with CNNs
item.description: This will be both my first and last post to this blog after a short (but wonderful!) 6 months at the Flatiron Institute. So I wanted to share a machine learning project that I’ve been working over the past few months with Adina Feinstein, a PhD student at University of Chicago who many of you TESS users may already know from her Eleanor package. We’ve designed a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) named Stella that automatically and rapidly detects flares in TESS light curves at high (99%!
